items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation engine that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on the user's latest interactions.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate improvement over baseline.
Recommendations are available on both desktop and mobile views.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data

notes: Assumed the requirement focuses on personalized recommendations for logged-in users; criteria and metrics are estimated due to lack of detailed business goals.
